Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Colorado in 2007...
Traded from Colorado to Toronto on 2/8/2007 (Going to COL: C J. Arencibia. Going to TOR: C J. Lucroy)...
Traded from Toronto to Los Angeles (N) on 7/18/2008 (Going to TOR: RF L. Ford. Going to LAN: C J. Lucroy)...
Injured on 4/8/2009 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/12/2010 with a Swollen Ear, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2012, off Brian Lawrence (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2012, off Robert Ray (ARI)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against San Diego, driving in 6 runs on 8/19/2017...
Injured on 9/4/2017 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 5/8/2019 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 5/14/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 8/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/19/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 8/19/2022...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 4/21/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2023, hitting .579 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
